name: Kog'Maw
title: the Mouth of the Abyss
lore: Belched forth from a rotting Void incursion deep in the wastelands of Icathia, Kog'Maw is an inquisitive yet putrid creature with a caustic, gaping mouth. This particular Void-spawn needs to gnaw and drool on anything within reach to truly understand it. Though not inherently evil, Kog'Maw's beguiling naiveté is dangerous, as it often precedes a feeding frenzy—not for sustenance, but to satisfy its unending curiosity.
blurb: Belched forth from a rotting Void incursion deep in the wastelands of Icathia, Kog'Maw is an inquisitive yet putrid creature with a caustic, gaping mouth. This particular Void-spawn needs to gnaw and drool on anything within reach to truly understand it...
allytips: Kog'Maw can outrange most champions with his Bio-Arcane Barrage ability.
Use Void Ooze to set up a perfect Living Artillery.
Make the most out of your Icathian Surprise.
enemytips: Kog'Maw doesn't have a good escape ability, so he is especially prone to ganks.
Run away from Kog'Maw after he dies!!!!
The range on Living Artillery increases each rank.
Bio-Arcane Barrage allows Kog'Maw to kill Baron Nashor extremely early. It can be valuable to ward Nashor when Kog'Maw completes his Blade of the Ruined King.

riot_spell_q.name: Caustic Spittle
riot_spell_q.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Passive: Kog'Maw gains {{ e2 }}% bonus attack speed.

Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

riot_spell_w.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
riot_spell_w.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain {{ e1 }} range and deal {{ e2 }}% <scaleAP>(+{{ f1 }})%</scaleAP> of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.

riot_spell_e.name: Void Ooze
riot_spell_e.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
riot_spell_e.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies in it by {{ e2 }}%.

riot_spell_r.name: Living Artillery
riot_spell_r.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Fires an artillery shot, damaging enemies above 40% health for {{ basedamagecalc }} to {{ middamagecalc }} magic damage based on their missing health.

If enemies are below 40% health, they take {{ maxdamagecalc }} magic damage instead.

Each subsequent shot within {{ manacostduration }} seconds costs {{ basecost }} more Mana (max {{ manacostcap }}).

riot_spell_i.name: Icathian Surprise
riot_spell_i.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Icathian Surprise
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon taking [[death|fatal damage]], '''Kog'Maw''' remains active for 4 seconds, becoming {{tip|pacify|pacified}}, {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}}, {{tip|untargetable}} and gaining up to {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} over the duration. He then explodes, dealing {{as|{{pp|125 to 550}} {{sti|true damage|link=yes}}}} to all nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* '''Kog'Maw''' is cleansed of all debuffs upon triggering ''Icathian Surprise''.
* {{ii|Guardian Angel}} and {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}} will take precedence over ''Icathian Surprise''.
** {{sbc|Possible Bug:}} Dying while affected by {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}} allows '''Kog'Maw''' to trigger ''Icathian Surprise'' immediately and then a second time right after he revives.
* After ''Icathian Surprise'' ends, the corpse of '''Kog'Maw''' will retain body block for the duration of his death animation.
* If '''Kog'Maw''' has an auto attack in the air at the same time that he's moving while he dies, as long as the auto hits the target after ''Icathian Surprise'' has started '''Kog'Maw''' will be able to auto once during ''Icathian Surprise''

wikia_skill_q1.name: Caustic Spittle
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kog'Maw''' launches a corrosive projectile in a target direction, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy it hits and reducing their {{sti|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|magic resistance}}}} for 4 seconds.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} For the next 8 seconds, '''Kog'Maw's''' basic attacks gain {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} and deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} [[On-hit effect|on-hit]], capped at 100 against minions and monsters.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling:
{{st|Bonus Range|{{ap|130 to 210}}}}
{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|3 to 6}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal but does not affect structures.
* ''Bio-Arcane Barrage's'' bonus damage will not interact with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} but will do so with {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}}.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Void Ooze
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kog'Maw''' spews a ball of ooze in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies for 1 second.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: The ooze lingers for 4 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies within the area for an additional {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Living Artillery
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kog'Maw''' launches a ball of acid into the air that drops after {{fd|0.6}} seconds at the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, increased by {{as|{{pp|type=target's '''missing''' health|11|key=%|0 to 50|key1=%|0 to 60|formula=0.833% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health. ''This is capped at 50% increase at 60% '''missing''' health.''}}|health}}, and {{tip|sight|revealing}} enemies hit for 2 seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 180}} {{as|(+ 65% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Increased Magic Damage|{{ap|100*1.5 to 180*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{fd|97.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|100*2 to 180*2}} {{as|(+ 130% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description2: ''Living Artillery's'' damage is doubled against enemies below {{as|{{sti|health|40% '''maximum''' health}}}}. Each subsequent ''Living Artillery'' within the next 8 seconds costs an additional {{as|{{sti|mana|40 mana}}}}, capping at {{as|{{sti|mana|400 per cast}}|mana}}.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* On cast ''Living Artillery'' grants slight {{tip|sight}} of the target area.
* ''Living Artillery'' will not reveal [[stealth]]ed champions (can still damage them).
